description: The shelve V3 API extension was added without a corresponding entry in setup.cfg to allow it to be loaded. A v3 version of the test cases were also were also missing.
title: missing entry in setup.cfg for shelve extension

comments.content: The shelve V3 API extension was added without a corresponding entry in setup.cfg to allow it to be loaded. A v3 version of the test cases were also were also missing.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 96895e29b1a1387c185fe740021bb636aa02709f
Author: Chris Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Oct 1 10:41:59 2013 +0930

    Adds missing entry in setup.cfg for V3 API shelve plugin
    
    Adds the missing entry in setup.cfg which allows the V3 API
    shelve plugin to be loaded. Also adds a v3 version of the unittests
    for the shelve plugin.
    
    Change-Id: I737ca0cae503b726b0103a4ae169ffca91188c87
    Closes-Bug: #1233454
